text: actually, i don't need a team, i could easily defeat you single-handedly. but the rules require four, so may i introduce, the third floor janitor, he lady from the lunchroom, and, my spanish is not good, either her son or her butcher. and what about your team? what rat have you recruited to the ss sinking ship?
